title: First week sprint
description: Solve the first user story,and otrher initial decision-making by teams.

title: Second week sprint
description: We'll be completing items 6, 7, and 12 of use stories, which correspond to the uploading of products, the buyer-seller interface, and the favorites and browsing history interfaces, respectively. We'll also be finishing up item 13 of use stories this week, which is the deployment of the backend and the database on cloud servers. This week will include two team meetings.

title: The third sprint
description: We'll be completing items 6, 7, and 12 of use stories, which correspond to the uploading of products, the buyer-seller interface, and the favorites and browsing history interfaces, respectively. We'll also be finishing up item 13 of use stories this week, which is the deployment of the backend and the database on cloud servers. This week will include two team meetings.

title: The Third sprint
description: We will improve our product release code, and finish debugging the code during this period to realize the front and back end interfacing problem of all the current interfaces. We will focus on completing the debugging of the image transfer problem of the product adding interface. Meanwhile, we will have an introduction of the minimized available products during the May Day holiday, we will discuss the time and complete the report before the holiday, which involves everyone's explanation of their own code and video recording and editing problems.

title: The fourth sprint
description: During the fourth sprint we will focus on beautifying and optimizing our pages, which will provide a better user experience. At the same time, we will optimize the data structure of our database, which will enable the team members to have a clearer understanding of the data structure of the project, which will be conducive to the subsequent expansion of the functionality and code.
